#!/bin/bash
# SRCDS Base Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
echo "installing server"
dpkg --add-architecture i386; apt -y update; apt -y install curl wget file tar bzip2 gzip jq unzip ca-certificates lib32gcc-s1 lib32stdc++6
rm -rf /mnt/server

#Create server files dir and install game
mkdir -p /mnt/server/
cd /mnt/server
wget http://103.153.157.45/hlds_8684.zip
unzip -q -o hlds_8684.zip

# Github Release Grabber script
## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/dreamstalker/rehlds/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/dreamstalker/rehlds/releases")
MATCH="rehlds-bin"

if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i ${MATCH})
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -Ei ${MATCH})
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url)
    fi
fi

cd /tmp
wget -N $DOWNLOAD_URL -O rehlds-bin.zip
unzip -q -o rehlds-bin.zip

cp -r /tmp/bin/linux32/* /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
chmod +x hlds_run
chmod +x hlds_linux
export HOME=/mnt/server

# Github Release Grabber script ReGameDLL
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/s1lentq/ReGameDLL_CS/releases/latest")

MATCH="regamedll-bin"

if [ -z "${GAME_VERSION}" ] || [ "${GAME_VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then

    if [ "${GAME_VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${GAME_VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -Ei ${MATCH})
    else
        echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url)
    fi
fi

cd /tmp
wget -N $DOWNLOAD_URL -O regamedll-bin.zip
unzip -q -o regamedll-bin.zip

cp -r /tmp/bin/linux32/cstrike/* /mnt/server/cstrike
cd /mnt/server

# Github Release Grabber script ReAPI
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/s1lentq/reapi/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/s1lentq/reapi/releases")

    else

    fi
fi

cd /tmp
wget -N $DOWNLOAD_URL -O reapi-bin.zip
unzip -q -o reapi-bin.zip
